verses.name: Genesis 8:1
verses.text: And God remembered Noah, and every living thing, and all the cattle that was with him in the ark: and God made a wind to pass over the earth, and the waters asswaged;

verses.name: Genesis 8:2
verses.text: The fountains also of the deep and the windows of heaven were stopped, and the rain from heaven was restrained;

verses.name: Genesis 8:3
verses.text: And the waters returned from off the earth continually: and after the end of the hundred and fifty days the waters were abated.

verses.name: Genesis 8:4
verses.text: And the ark rested in the seventh month, on the seventeenth day of the month, upon the mountains of Ararat.
